definitions.definition: Scheduled work outside of customary daylight working hours.

A mode of employment in which sets of workers are rotated to maintain a continuous 24/7 operation; usually, with a system of three 8-hour shifts (24 รท 3 = 8): first shift , second shift , and third shift .

main_definition: Scheduled work outside of customary daylight working hours.
secondary_definitions: A mode of employment in which sets of workers are rotated to maintain a continuous 24/7 operation; usually, with a system of three 8-hour shifts (24 รท 3 = 8): first shift , second shift , and third shift .
